sentence: The image is a movie poster for "Ace Ventura: Pet Detective."
sentence_cn: 图片是《艾斯·文图拉：宠物侦探》的电影海报。

sentence: At the top, the name "Jim Carrey" is prominently displayed.
sentence_cn: 在顶部，“金凯瑞 (Jim Carrey)”的名字显眼地显示出来。

sentence: The poster features a large image of a man holding out a card towards the viewer.
sentence_cn: 海报上有一幅巨大的男子形象，他向观看者伸出了一张卡片。

sentence: The card reads "ACE VENTURA PET DETECTIVE" with a logo of a cartoonish face and the text "To serve and protect...Your pets!"
sentence_cn: 卡片上写着“ACE VENTURA PET DETECTIVE”，上面有一个卡通脸的标志，还有文字“服务和保护......您的宠物！”

sentence: The man is wearing a colorful Hawaiian shirt and has a playful, mischievous expression.
sentence_cn: 男子身穿色彩鲜艳的夏威夷衬衫，表情俏皮又调皮。

sentence: To the right of the person, text reads: "He's the best there is!
sentence_cn: 在此人的右边，文字写着：“他是最棒的！

sentence: (Actually, he's the only one there is.)"
The bottom includes credits for the filmmakers and production companies, with logos for Warner Bros and others.
sentence_cn: 底部包括电影制片人和制作公司的名单，以及华纳兄弟和其他公司的标志。

sentence: The overall tone of the poster is comedic and engaging, matching the theme of the movie.
sentence_cn: 海报整体色调喜剧感十足，与电影主题相契合。
